parameters.name: butler
parameters.backgroundStory: The Butler has worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for the past 20 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides him: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Cook, the Maid, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The butler was Mr. Hamilton’s  most trusted man  and often helped him in his illegal activities carrying money and delivering notes to his counter-parties.The butler has been having a secret affair with the maid for 5 years. The butler is afraid his involvement in his activities will be discovered in court. He and the maid talked about killing him to save themselves and secure some cash that only the butter knows about. The butler spend the morning preparing to recieve the guests later tonight,  4 hours ago the butler led the businessman, who was shouting all over the place to the library and served him some tea. Mr Hamilton then called the butler upstairs to pick up a chest with gold bars to deliver to the businessman. After hearing Mr.Hamilton was dead the butler secretly hid that chest in a drawer in the dinning room.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Mr.Hamilton is being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.Knows the phone call logs are stored in the piano in the living room,. Knows the Cooks family business was ruined by Mr Hamilton long time ago.  Saw the journalist the other day in the house walking around alone but never saw him leaving the house. Knows his valuable personal knife that is usually stored in the visitors room drawer was stolen around the same day as the journalist visited. Saw the wife talking to a lawyer the other day in the study and overheard them talking about inheritances.Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the bookshelf of the study. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.
